scrollerScrollPane - Variable in class piccross.PiccrossView
scrollerScrollPane will hold consoleOutputTextArea and will add scroll ability to it.scrollerScrollPane is placed at SOUTH of consolePanel.

Method will send the current game in Piccross to server.

This method will send a message in string to server.

This method will set up the gridPanel which will hold the hints and grid boxes.
setup(int, int, int) - Method in class piccross.PiccrossModel
This method will setup each button with receiving the i and j which will indicate which button we are setting up on our 2D-Array of buttons.
setupHints() - Method in class piccross.PiccrossModel
This method will set up hints for our game depending on what is inside random generated boxes.

This method is a setter which will set the value array.

showSolution() - Method in class piccross.PiccrossModel
